attributes.action: Remove drinking adverts of the televison before the 9pm watershed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is amazing that one of the biggest problems in the modern world is drink related within teenagers. I therefore think it is about time these adverts are removed during a period that childen are watching. This is being done for 'bad food' and has also been done for smoking. I therefore recommend that they are placed at a time that are more suitable for adults.
